MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Kennedy Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.38am. Repairs are taking longer than expected as our engineers are now carrying out a complex repair on the underground cable network, caused by a third party near Perryston Lodge and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.51am on Thursday 29th April 2021.
